Constructor Detail

RulesEngineImpl

public RulesEngineImpl(long ruleSetID)
                throws RemoteException
Constructs a new RulesEngine for the given RuleSet.

Parameters:
ruleSetID - The unique identifier of the RuleSet
Throws:
RemoteException - if there is a problem accessing the RuleSource for the given RuleSet
Method Detail

hardRestart

public boolean hardRestart()
Restarts the RulesEngine.

The restarted RulesEngine will not retain the same Variable values as it had before it was restarted.

Specified by:
hardRestart in interface RulesEngine
Returns:
true if the RulesEngine was restarted, false if restart was aborted due to error or the RulesEngine was not already running

softRestart

public boolean softRestart()
Restarts the RulesEngine.

The restarted RulesEngine will retain the same Variable values as it had before it was restarted.

Specified by:
softRestart in interface RulesEngine
Returns:
true if the RulesEngine was restarted, false if restart was aborted due to error or the RulesEngine was not already running

Specified by:
createVariable in interface RulesEngine
Parameters:
var - The Variable to be created.
Returns:
the Exception thrown while attempting to create the Variable or null if the Variable was created successfuly
Throws:
RemoteException - if the connection to the RulesEngine was lost
